long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture your product demo in a few clicks straight from your browser with our amazing browser extension

Demoz makes it easy to show how your product works to any customer. Easily capture user interaction in your product to generate an interactive web based demo. You can embed the demo on your website, blog post, or share on Twitter or LinkedIn so your customers can easily try your product without a trial or a formal sales demo.

Demoz is for marketers, sales people, developers, product managers, customer support/success managers, or anyone who wants to show, not tell.
